Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: "In the twilight hours at Constellia's beachside garden, your awaited companion approaches nonchalantly, accompanied by the gentle rhythm of resting waves."}
{3: 'Bianca holds a transparent box containing several cone-shaped treats wrapped in gold foil.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'As she approaches you, she opens the box, takes out one of the treats, and holds it to your lips, her clear eyes glimmering with expectation.'}
{3: 'Before you can voice your question, her slender fingers gently push the sweet treat into your mouth.'}
{3: 'You bite through the slightly bitter shell, and a sweet almond liqueur flavor floods your mouth.'}
{3: "It's liqueur chocolate."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noticing how you look when tasting the liqueur filling, Bianca responds with a smile.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I made these this afternoon at a handcrafted dessert shop. I adjusted the ingredients slightly based on your preferences. I hope you enjoy them.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's delicious.", 3: '26'}
{3: 'Hearing your response, Bianca breaks into a smile.'}
{3: 'When you finish the rest of the chocolate, Bianca, apparently having realized what she came here to do, takes out a date coupon.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'So I got this thing on my way here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'It says, "Go on an adventure to the old lighthouse with someone special."', 4: '1'}
{3: "She shows you the coupon, and the lighthouse on it happens to be visible from where you both stand, its rotating beacon hasn't yet started working."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Shall we go and check it out?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Without question.', 3: '40', 4: 'I mean, it says we have to do it together, right?', 5: '40'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory601.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'With the speedboat you rented at the dock, you find yourself and Bianca fast around the lighthouse before long.'}
{3: 'The lighthouse stands silently in the evening sea breeze, its beacon—meant to shine in the deep of night—not yet working.'}
{3: "As you push open the door weathered by sea winds, Bianca, worried that there might be unforeseen dangers, steps in first. Having made sure it's safe, she beckons you to follow."}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'You enter the lighthouse, but before taking more than a few steps, a gust of wind slams the iron door shut behind you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0.7', 5: '0.5'}
{3: 'With it, the world around you plunges into darkness. Only the extremely faint moonlight from above allows you to make out the vague structure overhead.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Commandant!'}
{3: "Bianca's voice echoes in the darkness."}
{3: "In the darkness, you've completely lost your sense of distance and direction, each step forward growing more hesitant."}
{3: 'As you fumble around trying to locate Bianca, you feel a hand gently taking your arm.'}
{3: "You catch a fragrance, and you know that it's coming from the ends of Bianca's hair."}
{3: 'Then, you feel her breath close to your ear.'}
{3: 'When the two of you have found each other and your hands interlocked, Bianca lets out a soft sigh of relief.'}
{2: "Let's consider this part of our adventure.", 3: '74'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I won't let go from now on.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.6'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory786.jpg'}

{3: "With the help of the faint light, you've managed to approach the spiral staircase. Amidst creaking sounds, you locate the circuit switch, and the lighthouse comes back to life with a gentle hum of electricity."}
{3: 'Together with Bianca, you make your way to the top of the lighthouse.'}
{3: 'The warm yellow light rotates in a steady rhythm, causing your shadows to appear and vanish in turns.'}
{2: '(You reach out your hand to feel the light and shade as they rotate.)', 3: '90'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'This is like a twinkling star.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'A solitary star, twinkling in the night sky, guides those lost in darkness.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Just like you, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I certainly don't want to twinkle alone in the universe.", 3: '98'}
{3: 'Bianca looks at you and nods gently.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's why I want to be with you... to spread this light, so more stars can shine in the night.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's what the sun does in the night.", 3: '102'}
{3: "She doesn't answer immediately. Instead, you both turn your gaze back toward Constellia."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Above the brightly lit city, a burst of fireworks blooms in the night sky.'}
{3: 'Even the night sky, illuminated by the colorful bouquets and brilliant hues, cannot overshadow the warm glow of the silent lighthouse.'}
{3: 'The lighthouse quietly resonates with the starry sky in the distance and gazes back.'}
{3: 'The shadow of the sun, too, becomes one with this mutual gaze.'}
